EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_SG_CAB_Q118.CAB confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation of Registration for Pivotal Customer Advisory Board
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal Customer Advisory Board. Please see event details below.
Date & Time: 22 March 2018, 9:15 AM–5:00 PM {{my.2018 CAB SG:default=edit me}} Location: Pivotal, 140 Robinson Road, Level 16, Singapore 068907
Questions? Please email Jade Tan <[[mailto:jtan@pivotal.io]]>.
